title: Disconnecting frequently during games and in champion select
body: I've been experiencing frequent disconnections (every few minutes) during games and during champion select, they last about 30s to a minute. I know it's not my internet as other people have been playing fine on it. I have tried bug fixing LoL on the login screen with no benefit. It's very frustrating as I keep being temporarily banned (5mins after failing to pick a champion or ban one in champion select) and cannot play games properly. Is there anything I can do to solve this? If it helps, I'm playing on a mac.

replies.body:
Hey I might be Groot, 

Sounds like your client is having a hard time connecting to your computer. Has nothing to do with internet connection as much as it has to do with client connection. This KB should help you out though: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If you go through all these steps and you're still having issues you may want to send in a ticket to our tech team. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
I'll give it a go, thank you.
